description: The dead body of a deep one.
A dead body of a male deep one.
A dead body of a female deep one.
The dead body of a deep one, coated in congealed blood.
An awful, almost unidentifiable mass of charred flesh.
A dead body of a deep one with a gaping stab wound in its back.
The dead body of a deep one.  Its forehead bears a large bullet entrance wound.  An even larger exit wound is present on the back of its head.
The upper half of a dead deep one body, as if torn apart with enormous force.  Some organs are hanging out.
//: Former volume: 46250 L. Adjusted to 1000L so it can actually be placed. TODO(?): Re-add old volume with some sort of flag

description: A half-decapitated dead body.  It is unclear what could have caused such a wound.
The dead body of a deep one.  Its forehead bears a large bullet entrance wound.  An even larger exit wound is present on the back of its head.

snippet_category.text: The dead body of a deep one.  Its forehead bears a large bullet entrance wound.  An even larger exit wound is present on the back of its head.
The corpse of a deep one shot several times in the back with a low-caliber weapon.
A deep one corpse gored by arms fire chest to thighs, leaving the face eerily and fishily pristine.
The corpse of a deep one.  It appears to have been shot in the forehead at a very close range leaving you a good view of its brain matter.
The corpse of a deep one, its legs and arms covered in blood.  It appears to have been shot in the thigh.
The corpse of a deep one who appears to have been shot to death.  Its right arm is only barely still attached to his shoulder.
The corpse of a deep one unblemished but for the bloody hole atop its head, its bald scalp intermixed now with brain, viscera and shotgun pellets.
